title: Steamed rice
directions: Place rice and hot water into the inner saucepan and bring to the boil on the stove.

Stir rice continually while coming to the boil. Once boiling, cease stirring and boil for 1 minute. Cover with the stainless steel lid and allow boiling on a moderate heat for a further 2 minutes without lifting the lid.
Transfer into the DreamPot for the minimum cooking time.
Prior to serving, fluff the rice with a fork stirring from the bottom upwards.
ingredients: Cooking time in the DreamPot: 30 minutes minimum
